Rating: 10/10

ABSOLUTELY BRILLIANT !!!

I am GLaD, i should say, that i played this wonderful game.

In portal 1 GLaDOS was simply insane, now add another character to the insanity, however this gentleman is a mo.ron and is stupidly funny and chatty. 

No cake this time though and the ending song wasnt as epic as portal 1 but the game is so much more epic.

Esse jogo fica cada vez melhor, recomendo muito APROVADO COMPREM
this game is amazing make more games like it

Bon jeu dans l'ensemble, mais, pour ceux qui aimerait ce jeu et qui vont l'acheter (deux choses à dire) :

- Jeu de reflexion, et quand je dis reflexion c'est tout le jeu en mode histoire. Le multijoueur est bien avec des amis ^^
- Jeu qui peut prendre du temps et qui peut être fait rager si quelqu'un n'y arrive pas. Parce que il fait être doué pour tout faire.

Très bon jeu (surtout pour ceux que cela ne dérange pas de rester 1 heure en trainc de chercher une solution, mais toute débile en fait)

Однозначно должна понравиться тем, кому хоть немного понравилась первая часть.
Когда я начал играть в Портал 2, я далеко не сразу поверил что это старый-добрый движок Сурс. Просто его реально так превосходно допилили, что... что это просто блестяще! Менюшку не узнать. Единственное что загрузка стала гораздо дольше, но в остальном изменения крайне положительно сказались на красочности игры и прибавили её шарма, при том что требования к железу остались прежними.
Данная часть намного дольше (что радует полюбому на фоне 2-хчасового прохождения первой части), больше интриг, поворотов и возможностей, но при этом конечно же повымилась и сложность. Особенно порадовал передел голоса ГлэдОС: в первой части кровь из ушей текла от каждой её фразы, здесь же ей дали достаточно няшный и приятный голос, из-за которого её становится даже немного жаль даже после всех тех историй.

Melhor Puzzle Game que tive/tenho o prazer de jogar, história fantastica e um carisma por parte dos personangens marcante, extremamente imersivo, a cada teste de Portal 2 você se sente em Aperture Laboratories, sem mais!

Essencial!

SPACE!
PORTALS
Portal 1 в квадрате ! Мастхэв для всех любителей вселенной Half-Life и творчества Valve. Всем остальным категорически рекомендую попробовать в любом виде.

Jogo recomendado, realmente um classico e um trabalho muito bem feito da valve. A engine do jogo cumpre bem a sua tarefa, o humor é o ponto forte do jogo, assim como todo o esquema das salas de testes. Realmente mostra uma grande capacidade dos desenvolvedores de usar de modo inteligente a montagem de cada teste. Um otimo trabalho em equipe dos desenvovedores, como ponto fraco somente a falha nas legendas que se resolve renomenado arquivos, coisa que a empresa poderia ter resolvido a tempos, mas por sorte temos pessoas na comunidade que compartilham soluções simples que resolvem problemas simples.  

Obrigado e que Deus abençoe a todos!

+интересный сюжет
+сетевая игра
+Создание своих тестовых камер
Минусы==============
Минусы в отпуске*
I really like the thought and effort put into making a great story and tons of puzzles to complete for people to complete. I definitely suggest others play this game!

Portal 2 é um jogo incrivel, com certeza é um dos melhores jogos de puzzle, com uma otima historia e um final emocionante, super divertido e é um jogo que faz você pensar e ainda se sentir inteligente xD , alem do modo singleplayer, tambem tem um modo cooperativo muito divertido, todos com um pc bom o suficiente para rodar esse jogo deveriam experimentar (o que não é muito dificil pois não é um jogo muito pesado) nota 10/10
10 поющих турелей из 10

Portal 2 is a great sequel to the first game. The game focuses more on exploration and has a more engaging storyline that explains the events of the prequel. The dialogues (and monologues) between the characters are even more hilarious as it introduces several more quirky characters. However, I feel like the puzzle levels were a bit better in the previous game, even though there are several more elements introduced to the puzzles in this game that will make some levels frustratingly tricky to solve. Overall, this game feels like the better of the two. If you like the first game, you are going to love this. If you have never played through the first game, I highly recommend you to do so since the plot will make a lot more sense.
Großartiges Spiel mit vielen Rätseln. Es übertrifft sogar den ersten Teil.
На мой взгляд это лучшая игра своего времени.Моя оценка: 10/10.
Tytuł wyśmienity

Dnes jsem hru dohrál (Poprvé).
Ano, pravděpodobně jsi singleplayer ještě někdy zahraji.
Tohle byla možná ta nejlepší hra co jsem hrál!
Škoda, že již nebude pokračování nebo nějaké DLC. Příběh byl totiž kompletně uzavřen.
Ano, příběh, možná nejsilnější stránka hry. Příběh navazuje na první díl, ale je o hodně lepší.
V roli Chell, ženy která je testovacím subjektem společnosti Aperture Science, se snažíte dostat pryč.
Na své cestě potkáte GLaDOS, androidku která řídí celý systém Aperture Laboratories a Whetleyho,
robota, který vás téměř vždy dokáže rozesmát. Ano, nikoho jiného zde nepotkáte (Pokud nepočítám střílny). Jak tedy může mít tahle hra tak fantastický příběh? Zahrajte si ji a zjistíte so sami (nechci spoilerovat). Postavy, o kterých pouze uslyšíte jsou: Cave Johnson, majitel Aperture Science a Caroline, kdybych vám jí popsal, hodně bych spoileroval. Samotná hra je hodně originální a spočívá především na  vytváření portálů (Pro více informací se podívejte na jiné recenze). 
Hru dohrajete zhruba za 10 či více hodin a je celkem obtížná.
Závěrečné titulky nejsou jen obyčejné titulky. Uslyšíte v nich píseň určenou přímo pro Portal 2. 
Tahle píseň je opravdu krásná. Má vtipný text a krásnu hudbu.

Shrnutí

+ Příběh
+Hratelnost
+Originalita
+Kooperace
+Workshop
+Grafika
+Hudba (včetně závěrečné písně)
A mnoho dalšího
 
-Nic

Such a simple idea which has been so well developed and executed. Would highly recommend for a solid day's worth of co-op puzzle solving.
yes

All in all, Portal 2 is a really good game. It tests your brain as well as being fun. Although some levels make you want to smash your keyboark in fustration, the satisfaction of beating it is nice. It has an awesome plot with many twists and turns, as well as being jam packed with laugh out loud one-liners. Co-op is also a great idea, as it requires teamwork and trust more than anything. I love playing it with my friends. I spend hours in my bedroom playing this game and would highly reccomend it. It is a very unique game and I would give it a 5/5.

10/10

Portal 2 is a unique game with an amazing story, great characters and marvelous voice-acting! The idea is pretty simple, you put portals and walk through them, but the way it's made is the thing that makes that game perfect - the puzzles, the interactions, everything is just perfectly done.  It also has co-op, workshop, level editor and many achievements, which is amazing, since you can continue playing for hours and hours, facing new levels and mods, after you complete the main story. In conclusion:

Story: 10/10
Characters: 10/10
Voice-acting: 10/10
Graphics: 10/10
 
-Masterpiece!-

Also, try Portal 1. You'll understand the story better, if you play it before its sequel.

Еще одна эпичная игра от Valve. Меня игра [u]Очень[/u] порадовала. Сингл Бомба, все продумано отлично, история, персонажи ,уровни. Все на одном дыхании. Мультик это вобще отдельный разговор. [u]Одна из лучших игр, однозначно.[/u] Сложность действительно немного разочаровала, но в остальном игра прекрасна. Особенно порадовали новые фишки, которых небыло в первой части. Кооператив также приносит массу удовольствия и веселья.
[b]Моя оценка: 4.8/5[/b]

This is one of the best games i played in my entire life.
The idea of combining puzzles with portals is great and the singleplayer-story is is extremely good.
The multiplayer is just so much fun and if you run out of levels, the community is there with thousands, thousands of community test chambers - both single- and mutiplayer.
I wish Portal 3 so bad to be announced...

10/10 would buy again and play through the story for the 7th time.

Buy if you like:
1) Phenomenal voice-acting (I want JK Simmons' voice in ALL my games now)
2) Physics puzzles that are, at times, frustratingly difficult
3) Great sound design
4) Not killing things

Don't buy if you hate:
1) Yourself
2) Using your brain
3) Hearing a British accent
4) Potatoes

Final assessment: 9.9/10 (because I have issues with perfection)

This game is one of the best puzzle games I ever played. The story is incredible and so its the gameplay. And even it's multiplayer, you can play with your friends and solve puzzles with them. Another thing is that it has Steam Trading Cards and you can make badges, emoticons and backgrounds for your profile.

GOOD JOB VALVE

Das Spiel Portal 2 ist meiner Meinung nach eined der kreativeren und auch storylastigeren Puzzleplatformern.
Es hat sowohl lustige Eigenschaften stellt aber auch in gewisser Weise menschliche Züge in Robotern gut dar.
Die Puzzle sind anfangs einfacher aber werden im Laufe des Spiels anspruchsvoller und verlangen auch um die Ecke denken.
Auch wenn es nur eine relativ kurze Spielerfahrung war, war es das Geld auf jeden Fall wert und ich würde es auch wieder kaufen.

Um dos melhores jogos q já joguei!
Gráficos bons e fisica muito boa!
O jogo é longo e com vários elementos novos, bem mais completo e longo que o primeiro.
Essa continuação é uma melhoria extrema do primeiro em todos os aspectos.
Agora o jogo tem mais história e com mais dialogos com personagens novos, nesse jogo vc n se sente mais sozinho que nem no primeiro.
E além da campanha, agora tem as fases da comunidade em que se pode criar fases e jogar fases feitas por outros jogadores sendo co-op ou singleplayer. O criador de fases é muito bom mas queria que tivesse mais recursos para criar as fases.

*Nota: Esse jogo n é de ação nem de tiro, é um jogo de PUZZLE, então se vc jogou o primeiro e n gostou, é dificil vc gostar do segundo, mas se ainda n jogou dê uma chance, compre o primeiro e se gostar compre o segundo, no jogo é necessário que vc pense para resolver os desafios que podem envolver também física.

처음 그냥 퍼즐푸는 게임이라고 생각하고 했다가 놀라울정도에 밀도높은 과학적 이야기에 완전히 매료되었고

게임 클리어후 보너스컨텐츠 코믹스와 각종영상을 통해 더욱 완벽한 이야기를 만들어준다.

그리고 이야기를 이끌어가는 캐릭터에 대한 많은 생각을 하게 된다.

Portal 2 ist ein unglaublich gutes Spiel, welches mit den Genres "Puzzle", "Jump and Run" zusammen und einer guten Story und auch ein wenig Humor genau die richtige Mischung ergibt. Zudem fängt das Spiel ,der Situation entsprechend, immer die richtige Stimmung durch Grafik und Sound ein. Insgesamt gefällt es mir noch besser als sein Vorgänger, da die Geschichte und die Rätsel nochmal ein höheres Niveau erreichen. Die Namensgebende Portal-Gun wird nahtlos in das Spielgeschehen eingebunden, wodurch es nicht so aussieht als sei das Spiel wegen der Portal-Gun da, sondern die Portal-Gun wegen dem Spiel, was man in der heutigen Zeit nicht mehr so häufig sieht. Zudem gibt es auchnoch einen Multiplayer, welcher ebenfalls mit anderen Charakteren und neuen Rätseln unfassbar viel Spaß macht.
Insgesamt kann ich dieses Spiel einfach nur empfehlen, da es für diesen Preis einfach einen super Umfang hat und kaum Schwächen aufweist.
